glosses: so; in this way; like this (that)

examples.translation: I always write my letters like this/in this way.

glosses: in this level, so ... as this

examples.text: Böyle bir sevmek daha önce görülmedi.
examples.translation: There has never been seen a love as great as this.

glosses: signifies surprise or disfavour when added to questions

examples.text: Bu geç saatte nereye gidiyorsun böyle?
examples.translation: Where are you going at this late hour?

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish بویله (böyle), from Old Anatolian Turkish بیله (beyle), بویله (böyle), from Proto-Turkic *bunlayu. Cognate with Azerbaijani belə, (archaic) böylə, Gagauz bölä.
